welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Crepy-en-Valois, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to discover and immerse yourself in all the beauty and charm this city has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights at Le Bourget Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
